mapper.insert: insert into community(comnum, membernickname, memberEmail, comtitle, comcontent, comreco, com_re_ref, com_re_lev, com_re_seq, comviews, comdate) values(seq_comNum.nextval, #{memberNickname}, #{memberEmail},#{comTitle}, #{comContent}, 0, #{com_re_ref}, #{com_re_lev}, #{com_re_seq}, #{comViews}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select comnum, comtitle, membernickname, memberEmail, comcontent, com_re_ref, com_re_lev, com_re_seq, comviews, comdate, comreco from (select row_number() over (order by com_re_ref desc, com_re_seq asc) num, B.* from community B order by com_re_ref desc, com_re_seq asc) where num between #{row} and #{row}+9

select comnum, comtitle, membernickname, comcontent, com_re_ref, com_re_lev, com_re_seq, comviews, comdate, comreco from (select row_number() over (order by com_re_ref desc, com_re_seq asc) num, B.* from community B where comtitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by com_re_ref desc, com_re_seq asc) where num between #{row1} and #{row1}+9
select count(*) from community where comtitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update community set comtitle=#{comTitle}, comcontent=#{comContent} where comnum=#{comNum}
update community set com_re_ref=com_re_ref+1 where com_re_ref=#{com_re_ref} and com_re_seq>#{com_re_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from comlike where comNum = #{comNum} and memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
select count(*) from comlike where comNum = #{comNum} and likeN =#{likeN}
mapper.insert: insert into comlike (likenum ,comNum , memberEmail,likeN) values((select * from (select NVL (max(likenum),0)+1 from comlike)), #{comNum},#{memberEmail},1)
mapper.delete: delete from comlike where comNum = #{comNum} and memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
